Package prkmodel.repast

Class RepastNeuronNetwork

java.lang.Object
prkmodel.types.templates.DefaultNeuronNetwork
prkmodel.repast.RepastNeuronNetwork
All Implemented Interfaces:
NeuronNetwork
public final class RepastNeuronNetwork extends DefaultNeuronNetwork
Extends the functionality of DefaultNeuronNetwork to integrate with the Repast Simphony framework. Provides additional methods for adding and deleting edges in the network.
Since:
2024-07-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Samuele95
